Introduction to RStudio is a short course introducing people to R and RStudio.

The presenters are Jonathan Marshall and Olivia Angelin-Bonnet.

### Venue

The statistics computing laboratory in Science Tower B room 3.31 (ScB3.31).

### Preparation

If you're bringing your own laptop, then please install R and RStudio beforehand.

[Click here for instructions on downloading and installing R and RStudio](downloading.html)

In addition, download the materials below.

### Materials

Presentation slides are linked below.

Materials for exercises will be available here the week of the 8th of February.

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
#All the material for exercises is available [in this zip file](intro_to_r.zip). Unzip this to
#a convenient location, and open up `intro_to_r.Rproj` to load RStudio.
```
